attributes.action: Intervene in Mali (Help support the French with Air support and logisitcs)
attributes.additional_details:
Islamists in Mali have taken a  foothold in west Africa, the only country to offer salvation to the people of the Republic is France. It is time to offer tangible support (air and land, as well as logistics) to thwart Islamists taking a foothold in Mali.

Al-Qaeda would, without us stopping them, use Mali as a base from which to launch terrorist attacks across the continent and then wider Europe.

We, the undersigned, call on Britain to take on the Islamist where they stand.
